text:
This was reported in the old BlackBerry GitHub repo: https://github.com/blackberry/Ripple-UI/issues/653

There also was a Pull Request open with a fix: https://github.com/blackberry/Ripple-UI/pull/741

This just needs to be merged into the incubator project git repo (by myself). Creating a Bugzilla entry here to track it.
creator: brentlintner@apache.org
